pullrequest.title: Updates to log overwrite tests -> pull request #497

content.raw:
Removed `ignLogInit()` from LogRecord.cc in 81fc2f9.

For some reason `ignLogDirectory()` in the tests are printed from LogRecord.cc correctly - the default timestamped path,  but after `customExecStr()`is executed, `ignLogDirectory()` returns empty string. So I added `entryList()` and `entryDiff()` to find a difference of the entries in the directories and assume there is only 1 diff, that being the new timestamped directory. The caveat is that they rely on `directory_iterator` and won’t work for Mac.
content.html:
Removed ignLogInit() from LogRecord.cc in 81fc2f9.

For some reason ignLogDirectory() in the tests are printed from LogRecord.cc correctly - the default timestamped path, but after customExecStr()is executed, ignLogDirectory() returns empty string. So I added entryList() and entryDiff() to find a difference of the entries in the directories and assume there is only 1 diff, that being the new timestamped directory. The caveat is that they rely on directory_iterator and won’t work for Mac.
